value:
I am called Ophelia Dusk. When
shadow and light converge in the sky,
my true power shall be unveiled.

My father and mother mean the
world to me, and I'll always be
grateful to them.$k$pI am certain the Kingdom of Askr feels
grateful too—for the new star shining
in its sky named Ophelia!

There's no need to worry about not
having your own mark. After all, we're
both chosen ones guided by destiny!

The Order of Heroes has a nice ring
to it, but I feel like we could make it
sound even more impressive!$k$pHow about the Far-Flung Fellowship?
Do you think they'd let me join?

N-no, this isn't what it looks like! I'm
jumping up and down to...speak with
some new spirits! Via motion! Yeah!

Under all skies, the light of the moon
is the same. All are connected, so if
you see someone new, say hello!

The crystals glimmer... The stars and I
become one... Now, embrace the light!
Glorious Stella Nova!

This much is only natural. After all,
the star of destiny shines upon me!

It's all right! I'm still sparkling!
T-tell me I'm sparkling!

Forgotten spirits of stardust, grant me
strength! Phew... Now I'm even closer
to becoming a chosen one!

I see you've noticed my overflowing
power. Yes, I am a warrior of destiny,
chosen by the stars themselves.$k$pThose who have witnessed my power
call me Ophelia of the Glittering Stars!

I see it—countless worlds in crisis.
Their fates are stirring, preparing to
converge...$k$pBut I can hear the spirits of ancient
stars whispering to me, telling me
how calamity can be averted, and...$k$pYeah, I think I'll go with this plot for a
while! A grandiose start like that will
make the foreshadowing way easier.$k$pWhat am I talking about, you ask?
I guess it's the power of imagination.$k$pSort of like how you have to really
imagine a wish for it to come true.
In a way, I'm practicing for that.$k$pSee, I've always admired my father
and mother for not only fighting for a
better world, but believing in one.$k$pAnd now that I'm here, in another
world, I intend to carry on that
legacy!$k$pIf you say it enough times, it'll
become true, right? That's the power
of a person's will.$k$pAll that's left after that is to follow
the stars that guide us. That's what it
means to be a chosen one!
Brilliant Blinding Nova!
Vibrant energy bursts forth!
I bestow this light upon you!
A flash of star might!
The stars...fade...
Ta-da! Oh, with this new power, I'm one step closer to becoming the chosen one!
*gasp* This magical tome is very special, so I'm afraid I can't give it to you!
I'm a warrior chosen by the stars. I must be destined to fight, mustn't I?
Father looks kinda jealous. I wonder why? He's so much more amazing than me!
I just wanna yell out "woosh!" and "bam!" when I deal the finishing blow, don't you?
Do I deserve this new power...? No! I can't doubt my destiny!
Our hearts will remain connected by the stars, no matter our distance. Of that, I'm sure!
Why not?
Hrmm....
Watch me shine!
